snippet.title: Metal Slug XX - Launch Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
METAL SLUG XX, the last instalment in the famous run-and-gun series, returns to the battlefield on PlayStation 4® with a plethora of new features! In addition to upscaled graphics, METAL SLUG XX is fully compatible with DUALSHOCK®4 game controllers, offers two different types of scanlines and a brand new series of Trophies! In addition to the six characters included in the original release, Leona Heidern is now playable from the beginning!

©SNK CORPORATION ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
